doc.members:
UnityEngine.HoloLens
This component enables control over properties attached to AudioSource components for spatial sound in Unity.
Describes room size to for audio effects.
Describes room size to for audio effects.
A BaseInputModule designed for HoloLens input.
Defines the number of pixels of emulated mouse movement when a value of positive or negative 1 is reported by the device for a navigation gesture.
Controls the number of seconds that taps (emulated mouse clicks) will leave any tapped UI object in the Pressed state for better user feedback.
See BaseInputModule.
See BaseInputModule.
